mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.order_id AS "order.id", crk.ddbh AS "order.ddbh", a.transfer_type AS "transferType", a.out_account AS "outAccount", a.in_account AS "inAccount", a.travel_unit AS "travelUnit", a.trans_money AS "transMoney", a.transfer_date AS "transferDate", a.jsr AS "jsr.id", sujsr.name AS "jsr.name", a.subject_code AS "subjectCode.id", ckm.kmname AS "subjectCode.kmname", a.approval_status AS "approvalStatus", a.auditor AS "auditor.id", su.name AS "auditor.name", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate"
LEFT JOIN c_rkckddinfo crk ON crk.id=a.order_id LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON su.id=a.auditor LEFT JOIN sys_user sujsr ON sujsr.id=a.jsr LEFT JOIN c_km ckm ON ckm.id=a.subject_code
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM f_transfer_account a
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO f_transfer_account( id, order_id, transfer_type, out_account, in_account, travel_unit, trans_money, transfer_date, jsr, subject_code, approval_status, auditor, remarks, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{order.id}, #{transferType}, #{outAccount}, #{inAccount}, #{travelUnit}, #{transMoney}, #{transferDate}, #{jsr.id}, #{subjectCode.id}, #{approvalStatus}, #{auditor.id}, #{remarks}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE f_transfer_account SET order_id = #{order.id}, transfer_type = #{transferType}, out_account = #{outAccount}, in_account = #{inAccount}, travel_unit = #{travelUnit}, trans_money = #{transMoney}, transfer_date = #{transferDate}, jsr = #{jsr.id}, subject_code = #{subjectCode.id}, approval_status = #{approvalStatus}, auditor = #{auditor.id}, remarks = #{remarks}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
